doc:
P. Jay Sidney https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/P._Jay_Sidney 0 P. Jay Sidney (April 8, 1915 – September 30, 1996) was an American screen actor, who was also known as Jay P. Sidney. Although obscure today, he was a prominent activist who fought for equal representation of African Americans in American entertainment. P._Jay_Sidney ( April_8_,_1915 – September_30_,_1996 ) was an_American_screen_actor , who was_also_known as Jay_P._Sidney . Although obscure_today , he was a_prominent_activist who fought for equal_representation of African_Americans in American_entertainment .
